name: Jay Moretti
body:
# WHO?

Hello,
My name is Jay Moretti, I’m 28 yrs old.
I love my daughter, video games, game development, web development, mobile development, motion, 3D, my wife, comics, weird music, video games, bad movies, reverse engineering, new technologies, front-end design, video games, football (the real one, you know, with an actual ball and that you use your feet to play it), beer and a lot of other stuff.

I’m currently working fulltime @ madeinhaus.com as a good for all developer. Right now I’m focusing on HTML5, but I can play along nicely with AS3, physics, 3D, Obj-C, Java, C and C++, and I’m working my way onto the OpenGL realm.

I’m also the User Group Manager at ASDevs a brazilian actionscript user group and my name is on the Flash CS5.5 credits as top beta tester (and I know you couldn’t give a shit about this, but it’s cool to note anyway).

Avaliable for freelance jobs and Fifa 13 matches! (jrmoretti on PSN)

Drop me a line or Skype me if you wanna talk about something.

Current Projects:

* LLCoolJ - JS Lazy Loader
* ASNES – AS3 Snes Emulator
* Sublime Text 2 AS3 Bundle

CV upon request.

[G+](http://jaymoretti.com/+)
[Twitter](http://jaymoretti.com/twitter)
[Facebook](http://jaymoretti.com/facebook)
